ModMetaData.name: [RF] Fishing Recipes
ModMetaData.author: Zaljerem
ModMetaData.description:
Restores the fishing cooking recipes removed from the RF Fishing Rework mod. While I appreciate the sushi update, a whole new table, crops, etc. is a little more than I feel like dealing with.
4 recipes: Sushi (Cooking:6) +7 mood bonus Boiled Shellfish (Cooking:3) +5 mood bonus Escargot (Cooking:3) +5 mood bonus Shrimp Scampi (Cooking:3) +5 mood bonus
(All meals were +7 mood in the original mod) Updated Sushi meal texture (was the same as Boiled Shellfish)
Requires [RF] Fishing-ReWork
Big thanks to Rainbeau Flambe, Mlie, and Si-Cafe!
New bonus simple recipes here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2602272144
Do you like smoked fish? My smoked meat/fish mod with support for basically all known fishing mods: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2594528677
Si-Cafe's excellent, far prettier, and far more detailed Seafood and Sushi Addon here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2384576356
